summary: The script performs an end‑to‑end integration test that synthesizes speech from a set of predefined text strings using a text‑to‑speech model, then feeds the generated audio into an automatic speech recognition model to transcribe it back, finally computing the word error rate to assess the combined TTS‑ASR pipeline.
business_intent: Automate validation of TTS and ASR model compatibility and quality within continuous integration, ensuring that updates to either component do not break the overall speech processing workflow.
